com.salesforce.androidsdk.util

Class AuthConfigTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.util.AuthConfigTask

  • public class AuthConfigTask
extends <any>
    A simple AsyncTask that fetches auth config if it exists and calls the supplied callback method on the UI thread once the call is complete. The auth config is not fetched for production and sandbox.
    Author:
    bhariharan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AuthConfigTask.AuthConfigCallbackInterface
      A callback interface that is triggered after auth config has been fetched.
